it.apice.sapere.api.ecolaws
Interface ChemicalPattern<ExtenderType>

Type Parameters:
ExtenderType - Is the class type which extends this interface (This information is used in order to provide a correct cast for methods that provide cascade invocation).
All Known Subinterfaces:
Product, Reactant
public interface ChemicalPattern<ExtenderType>

This interface models a generic template which represents a component of an Ecolaw.

Author:
Paolo Contessi
